text: Back to the Stone Age is a novel by American writer Edgar Rice Burroughs. Back to the Stone Age may also refer to: *A title from the 1989 album No Anaesthesia! by Finnish thrash metal band Stone *A number-one single in Finland in 1989 by Stone *A title from the 2012 album Monster by American hard rock/heavy metal group Kiss *The phrase " "bomb them back to the Stone Age", attributed to American general Curtis LeMay
title: Back to the Stone Age (disambiguation)
